item.title: About Hugo
item.author: mail@example.org (Bill Daws)
item.description:
Welcome to my website.

I’m a software developer living in the Northeastern United States.

I live with my fiancée, Megan, and our two cats.

Sometimes I post what I’m thinking about on this site, but it will never be the viewpoints of my employer, unless explicitly stated otherwise.

You can email me at billdaws.marvelous519@passmail.net. (This is an alias email – posting my real one could expose me to an unstoppable deluge of spam.)
